text:
Kroger had a 30% jump in sales in March. It gave its CEO a 21% pay raise last year, bringing his pay to $14 million.

The company just ended $2/hour hazard pay for employees. Ditto for Amazon (its stock is at a record high), Starbucks and others
https://t.co/vrYSnWW9KY
